attributes.action: have more police officers on the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of police officers time is spent completing huge amounts of paperwork often within the police station, when the time could be spent pro avtively on the streets, detering criminals from committing crime. The whole system needs a major overall. consulation needs to take place with the officers doing the job on the street and not by someone who works in an office who has very litte idea of what a police officers job entails and the processes and paperwork that is involved
